blogPost.excerpt: Beacons is a mobile website builder for creators on TikTok and Instagram, with e-commerce and monetization built in. Set up a beautiful page in one minute.
blogPost.body: Beacons is a mobile website builder for creators on TikTok and Instagram, with e-commerce and monetization built in. Set up a beautiful page in one minute.
blogPost.title: Beacons - Monetize your TikTok, Twitter, and Instagram bio links
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: Beacons是一款针对TikTok和Instagram上的创作者的移动网站建设工具，内置电子商务和货币化功能。一分钟就能建立一个漂亮的页面。
localize.tagline: 将您的TikTok、Twitter和Instagram生物链接货币化。

localize.description: Beacons是一款針對TikTok和Instagram上的創作者的移動網站建設工具，內置電子商務和貨幣化功能。一分鐘就能建立一個漂亮的頁面。
localize.tagline: 將您的TikTok、Twitter和Instagram生物鏈接貨幣化。

previous.excerpt: https://illustrationkit.com is a collection of premium open-source illustrations with new illustration added daily. Currently - 110+ scenes - 55+ characters - Character creator for figma & sketch - New illustration added daily - Roadmap to add 300+ illustrations
previous.title: Illustration Kit - Premium open source illustrations updated daily

localize.description: https://illustrationkit.com 是一个优质的开源插画集，每天都有新的插画加入。目前--110+场景--55+角色--figma和sketch的角色创建者--每天添加新的插画--增加300+插画的路线图。
localize.tagline: 每天更新的高级开源插图

localize.description: https://illustrationkit.com 是一個優質的開源插畫集，每天都有新的插畫加入。目前--110+場景--55+角色--figma和sketch的角色創建者--每天添加新的插畫--增加300+插畫的路線圖。
localize.tagline: 每天更新的高級開源插圖

next.excerpt: Enter a link to any web resource to get a new one that you can schedule to be released at a time of your choice and share it to keep your audience engaged.
next.title: Urlcast.io - Hide an URL as long as you want

localize.description: 输入任何网络资源的链接，就可以获得一个新的资源，你可以安排在你选择的时间发布，并分享给你的观众，以保持你的观众参与。
localize.tagline: 只要你想，就可以隐藏一个URL

localize.description: 輸入任何網絡資源的鏈接，就可以獲得一個新的資源，你可以安排在你選擇的時間發佈，並分享給你的觀衆，以保持你的觀衆參與。
localize.tagline: 只要你想，就可以隱藏一個URL
